about_the_game:
Jigs4w3D Puzzle Challenge is a casual single-player experience. Chill, enjoy this immersive 3D environment and complete a fine selection of your favourite puzzles. How would that feel solving puzzles at work after all your colleagues went home? Try it out now in the Loft Office Environment DLC.

Features

new environment - Loft Office



10 new puzzles

5 difficulties for each puzzle

50 new achievements will be added later on

enhanced camera movement
  • find small details easily

made in Unreal Engine 5
  • cozy, realistic, colorful and immersive full 3D environment
  • real-time physics, powered by Chaos Physics
    • light-weight physics simulation solution used in Fortnite
